name: Curse Loop
description:
This is my submission to the Ludum Dare 47 game jam, its a game about a guy whose cursed to stay in a one minute loop for the rest of eternity, meaning after every minutes e is forced back to where he was one minute ago, and in other to get out of this curse he went to a dungeon where he can get a Wishing Star which can grant any wish.

Your goal: Level 1- there are three rooms, get a gem(its green in color) from each room  and come back to the npc in the room you started in, touch him after you get the three gems and you can then go through a door and get to the next level , do this before the 60 seconds time limit of your curse runs out!

Boss level- just defeat the boss, be careful of the lazers and once the boss is dead , the wishing star will come, collect it and you win!

Credits:

Music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsLlqLIE-TqDq3lh5kU2PeA

sound effect: SFXR

this is my first Ludum Dare! and i know the games bad but i had fun making it!.
